title: Simmons Lab Resources
text: goal Simmons Lab Resources provide single point reference variety helper functions files used course Lab’s work.

title: AQ Codebook — aq_codebook
text: codebook assist analysis Autism Spectrum Quotient Baron-Cohen et al (2001)

title: AQ Codebook — aq_codebook
text: data frame 50 rows 6 variables question_number question number original AQ questionnaire aq_10_question_number question number AQ-10. NA AQ-10 subscale subscale question measures abbr_subscale abbreviated name subscale reversed Whether item reversed scoring question_text full text item string matching

title: GSQ Codebook — gsq_codebook
text: codebook assist analysis Glasgow Sensory Questionnaire Robertson Simmons (2013)

title: GSQ Codebook — gsq_codebook
text: data frame 42 rows 6 variables question_number original question number original GSQ gsq_14_question_number question number GSQ-14 modality sense question referring abbr_mod abbreviated name modality direction Whether item question testing hyper- hypo- reactivity question_text full text item string matching

what: Tukey Ladder of Powers Transformation — tukeyLadderOfPowers
title: Tukey Ladder of Powers Transformation — tukeyLadderOfPowers
text: Returns numeric vector transformed using Tukey's Ladder powers approximately normal.

title: Tukey Ladder of Powers Transformation — tukeyLadderOfPowers
code: tukeyLadderOfPowers(   x,   start = -3,   end = 3,   by = 0.025,   printResult = FALSE,   plotResult = FALSE )

title: Tukey Ladder of Powers Transformation — tukeyLadderOfPowers
text: x vector numeric values transformed start lowest value lambda tested end highest value lambda tested step value lambdas printResult Whether print chosen value lambda plotResult Whether plot Anderson-Darling values
